name: render_increments_drawio
instructions: Render increments from story-graph.json to DrawIO using the story_io CLI. Execute: python -m agile_bot.bots.story_bot.src.synchronizers.story_io.story_io_cli render-increments --story-graph {project_path}/docs/stories/story-graph.json --drawio-file {project_path}/docs/stories/story-map-increments.drawio --output {project_path}/docs/stories/story-map-increments.drawio
